title: Caution Urged in Embracing AI Solutions Says Minister Khattar
description: Union Minister Manohar Lal Khattar urges cautious adoption of artificial intelligence. Addressing 'All India Speakers’ Conference' in Delhi, he highlights AI's benefits and risks, noting cybercrime's challenge. Khattar shares digital governance success during his tenure. Union Minister Jyotiraditya Scindia supports technology use for modernizing Delhi Assembly.
content:
Union Minister Manohar Lal Khattar on Monday advocated for the cautious adoption of artificial intelligence, citing both its capability to provide solutions and its potential to cause harm.
During the valedictory session of the 'All India Speakers' C... [639 chars]

title: Outrage as cash-strapped council uses 'pensioners as lab rats'
description: The council is hoping to plug a £4 million deficit by using artificial intelligence to determine when elderly residents should go into care.
content:

title: OpenAI picks Coursera’s Raghav Gupta to lead its education vertical in India
description: Separately, OpenAI announced the launch of OpenAI Learning Accelerator, an India-first initiative to train teachers on using artificial intelligence.
content:

title: AI plays an ever-bigger role on college campuses
description: While universities contemplate artificial intelligence use in the classroom, they are relying on the technology to cut down on operating costs and recoup staff’s time.
content:

title: How Inc. 5000 Companies Are Using AI for Sales
description: The CEOs at America's fastest-growing small businesses are overwhelmingly enthusiastic about artificial intelligence.
content:

title: URI professor developing AI-driven robotics for people with disabilities
description: Reza Abiri is working to restore some independence for stroke survivors and people with physical disabilities through artificial intelligence and robotics.
content:
